original_text: Finally, you bring his life to an end. He leaves this world. You change his face in death and you send him away. Finally, you bring his life to an end. He leaves this world. You change his face in death and you send him away. Finally, you bring his life to an end. He leaves this world. You change his face in death and you send him away. Finally, you bring his life to an end.
korean_text: 주께서 사람을 영원히 이기셔서 떠나게 하시며 그의 얼굴 빛을 변하게 하시고 쫓아보내시오니

sentences.original_text: Finally, you bring his life to an end.
You change his face in death
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 죽음 속에서 그의 얼굴을 바꿉니다.

sentences.original_text: Finally, you bring his life to an end.
You change his face in death
